trans-unit.source: Creates a control that generates a list of items in a bulleted format.
trans-unit.target: 创建以项目符号格式生成项列表的控件。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the BulletedList control to create a list of items that are formatted with bullets.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#Introduction) - [可访问性](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax) # # 简介使用如何控制使用项目符号中创建的格式设置的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: To specify the individual list items that you want to appear in a BulletedList control, place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the BulletedList control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定你想要显示如何在各列表项，将放置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>每个条目开始和结束标记的如何控件之间的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>

trans-unit.source: To specify the bullet type to use to display list items in a BulletedList control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property to one of the bullet types that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要用于显示如何在列表项的项目符号类型，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>属性设成一个由定义的项目符号类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available bullet styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的项目符号样式。

trans-unit.source: |Bullet style|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|Not set.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A number.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An empty circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled square.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A custom image.| Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A> property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered BulletedList control.
trans-unit.target: |项目符号样式 |说明 | |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|未设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|一个数字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|一个小写字母。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|一个大写字母。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|小写罗马数字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|大写罗马数字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|一个完整的圆。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|空圆。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|一个实心矩形。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|自定义映像。 | 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A>属性指定开始编号的有序的如何控件中列表项的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: The value that is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A> property is ignored, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> field.
trans-unit.target: 分配给值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A>忽略属性，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>字段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.FirstBulletNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property to the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> to specify a custom image for the bullet, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> property also to specify the location of the image file.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>属性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>若要指定项目符号的自定义映像，必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A>属性还可以指定图像文件的位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the display behavior of the list items in a BulletedList, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property to one of the values that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要在如何指定列表项的显示方式，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>属性设成一个由定义的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The defined display behaviors are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 定义的显示行为是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When a hyperlink is clicked, it navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: 单击超链接时，它将定位到 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A> property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>属性指定的超链接导航到的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Target%2A> property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is navigated to when a hyperlink is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Target%2A>属性指定的框架或显示时单击的超链接导航到网页的窗口。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>, the BulletedList control displays list items as links that post back to the server when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>，如何控件的列表项显示为回发到服务器时单击的链接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions that are performed when a link button is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式控制单击链接按钮时执行的操作，提供的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedItem%2A> properties are inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class and are not applicable to the BulletedList control.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedItem%2A>属性继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>类并不适用于如何控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the event data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> class to determine the index of the link button in a BulletedList that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件数据的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>类以确定被单击如何中的链接按钮的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The BulletedList control also supports data binding.
trans-unit.target: 如何控制还支持数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: To bind the BulletedList to a data source, you can use any of the provided data-binding mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: 若要绑定到数据源如何，你可以使用任何提供的数据绑定机制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: # # 辅助功能默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级别 1 准则。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要显示在为每个项目符号的图像的路径<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bullet style for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的项目符号样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> property to specify the bullet style to apply to the list items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>属性来指定要将应用的列表项中的项目符号样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>属性使用其中一个设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>枚举值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: |Bullet style|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|Not set.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A number.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase letter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A lowercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An uppercase Roman numeral.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|An empty circle.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A filled square.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|A custom image.| Specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> value allows you to supply your own image for the bullet.
trans-unit.target: |项目符号样式 |说明 | |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|未设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|一个数字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|一个小写字母。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|一个大写字母。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|小写罗马数字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|大写罗马数字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|一个完整的圆。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|空圆。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|一个实心矩形。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>|自定义映像。 | 指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>值，您可以提供自己的映像作为项目符号。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: If you specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> value, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> property to the URL of the custom image to use.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>值，还必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A>属性设置为要使用自定义图像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control does not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property because the bullets are inherently decorative and do not provide additional information that needs to be conveyed via assistive technology.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控件不支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>属性因为项目符号本身是装饰性的并且不提供需要传达通过辅助技术的其他信息。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use a custom image to convey a concept to the user, you should add additional text to each of the bulleted list items or use a control that allows you to specify alternate text for each image.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要使用自定义映像来传达给用户的概念，你应将其他文本添加到每个项目符号列表项或使用控件，您可以指定每个图像的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display mode of the list content in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Use the DisplayMode property to specify the display behavior to apply to the content of list items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayMode property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: DisplayMode 属性使用其中一个设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>枚举值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: |Value|Displayed as| |-----------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|Text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|Hyperlinks.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|Link buttons.| The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> value allows you to display list content as hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: |值 |显示为 | |-----------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|文本。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|超链接。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>|链接按钮。 | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>值使你可以显示为超链接的列表内容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When clicked, a hyperlink navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: 单击时，超链接导航到 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于开始编号的有序中列表项的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the FirstBulletNumber property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: FirstBulletNumber 属性用于指定开始编号的有序中列表项的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The value that is assigned to the FirstBulletNumber property is ignored, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: 将忽略被分配给 FirstBulletNumber 属性的值，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the value of the FirstBulletNumber property is an integer, it does not always cause a bullet to render as a number.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 FirstBulletNumber 属性的值是一个整数，它将不会始终会导致项目符号数字的形式呈现。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the FirstBulletNumber property to `4` and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A> property to the value <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>, the first bullet number will render as a lowercase d.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 FirstBulletNumber 属性设置为`4`和设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>属性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle>，第一个项目符号数字将呈现为小写的 d。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.BulletStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control when a form is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控制当窗体回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control when a link button within the item list is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用 RaisePostBackEvent 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制当单击项列表中的链接按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The containing page specifies the index of the clicked link button in the `eventArgument` parameter, which is used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含的页上指定的索引中的被单击的链接按钮`eventArgument`参数，用于初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method raises a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event by passing the initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostBackEvent 方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>通过传递初始化的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.OnClick%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method optionally can perform validation before raising the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click> event for the control.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostBackEvent 方法 （可选） 可以执行在引发前的验证<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>控件事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.Click>

trans-unit.source: To validate a group of controls on the page when a link button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> is clicked, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> property to `true` and specify the group of controls to be validated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证的一组中的链接按钮时的页上的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>单击后，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>属性`true`并指定要验证中的控件组的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: The string representation for the index of the list item that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件的列表项的索引字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.target: 写入<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控件内容写入指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>以便在客户端上显示的对象。

trans-unit.target: Render 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.target: Render 方法写入所呈现的内容的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>到客户端使用提供的项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.target: 如果没有中的至少一个列表项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合，Render 方法写入的 HTML 内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.RenderContents%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList.RenderContents%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderBeginTag%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control is rendered if the data source has no data or if the control is not data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果数据源没有数据或控件未进行数据绑定是否呈现控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is rendered if the data source has no data or if the control is not data-bound; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果时呈现控件，如果数据源没有数据，或控件未进行数据绑定;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中的当前选定项的从零开始索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: In the base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A> property returns a zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 在基的类中， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>属性返回当前选定项的从零开始索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that nothing is selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1，指示未选定任何内容。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex 属性不适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you use the `get` accessor for the SelectedIndex property, it always returns `-1`.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**当你使用`get`SelectedIndex 属性访问器，它始终返回`-1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is linked to when a hyperlink in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，用于显示中的超链接时链接到的网页内容<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the special values that are listed in the following table, which begin with an underscore.
trans-unit.target: 值必须以字母 a 到 Z （区分大小写），在以下表中，列出其以下划线开头的特殊值除外范围的开头。

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|Renders the content in the immediate frame-set parent.| |`_search`|Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported.
trans-unit.target: |值 |说明 | |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|呈现在新窗口中没有框架的内容。 | |`_parent`|呈现的即时框架集父代中的内容。 | |`_search`|呈现搜索窗格中的内容。 | |`_self`|呈现具有焦点的框架中的内容。 | |`_top`|呈现没有框架的完整窗口中的内容。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 检查你的浏览器文档以确定如果`_search`值受到支持。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 和更高版本支持`_search`目标值。

trans-unit.source: Use the Target property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is linked to when a hyperlink in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 目标属性用于指定的框架或显示中的超链接时链接到网页的窗口<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: To display the content of the list items as hyperlinks in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode> property to the value <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 列表项的内容显示为超链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控件，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListDisplayMode></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>中

trans-unit.source: Then, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A> property of each list item to the URL of the Web page to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 然后，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>Web 页后，可以导航到的每个列表项的 URL 属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Target property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the hyperlink is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置目标属性，单击超链接时将刷新浏览器或具有焦点的窗口。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Target property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Target 属性呈现为`target`属性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`属性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许的元素。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the Target property if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置目标属性的呈现的输出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>必须符合 XHTML 1.1。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > > When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the Target property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: >> 时创建可访问网页，强烈建议你避免使用的目标属性将另一个窗口作为目标。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 目标窗口或框架，用于加载该 Web 页时，链接到中的超链接<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList"></xref>单击。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。
